Row.Text: Let us rule by force of personality, by passion, rather than some bloodless system!
Yekaterina Alekseyevna, Catherine, tsarina and patron of the arts. But you can call me Sophie.
Yekaterina Alekseyevna, Catherine, tsarina and patron of the arts. But you can call me Sophie.
Yekaterina Alekseyevna, Catherine, tsarina and patron of the arts. But you can call me Sophie.
I am already planning my triumphal parade after your defeat.
Come, then. I will leave you where — as they say — the crayfish sleep.
Look after my palace when I am gone. The Grand Church must be aired regularly, and keep the amber dusted. You mu — No. It is yours. I leave now.
Lovely. Let us make it so.
Friendship is friendship, but there are times that I must say no.
